name: Mini Tank Mayhem
description: Collect the rare cards, Build your combo, and destroy the invading alien in this deckbuilder tower defense game. Welcome to Mini Tank Mayhem, a game about cute tanks doing CHAD things.

name: Rootmare
description: Step into a world where the pursuit of beauty leads to unimaginable horror. As Nate, face off against mutated monstrosities and navigate a labyrinth of danger with limited resources. Expose the truth behind COSMIC’s experiments, while not succumbing to the nightmare within.

name: Repeat After Death
description: The task is simple, defeat enemies using various Characters. But, your past move will consume you the more you continue down the path. Discover the dungeon mysteries while engaging with the other dungeon dwellers

name: Jet Scalawag: The King of Shooters
description: Fight the mother of all space battles in an epic space combat shooter to end all space combat shooters! Jet Scalawag faces down the evil alien armada through time and space on worlds and expanses never before seen!

name: Open Fire
description: Open Fire is a game boy style arcade game heavily inspired by old game boy games. The game puts together deck building, card collections, and a fun real time battle system. Explore and fight four different sectors, free the island, and collect all the cards! Then do it all again as your collection grows stronger.

name: Lola's Lutong Bahay
description: Lola's Lutong Bahay is an immersive Filipino cooking simulation game where players step into the shoes of Dalisay, a budding chef learning traditional recipes from her beloved grandmother, Lola Felicia. Explore vibrant kitchen settings, master authentic Filipino cooking techniques, and embark on a flavorful journey to recreate iconic dishes. hone your culinary skills and celebrate the rich cultural heritage of Filipino cuisine in this heartwarming game.

name: The Dog
description: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a middle-aged man dealing with probably the most life-changing day in his life. You can briefly do routine family man tasks and live through the story.

name: Super Senseless Soccer
description: The best football rogue-lite ever made! Super Senseless Soccer has a unique twist: start with a normal football game, then add a large variety of illegal modifiers and game-changing Upgrade Tickets in order to trigger ridiculous combos. It's super! It's senseless! It's SOCCER!!!

name: Falling Rain
description: Falling Rain is a third-person anime shooting RPG game with advance movement mechanic. Immerse yourself in a post apocalypse world and experiences the character struggle and follow the character to the end of their story.

name: The Quarantine
description: Experience a blend of survival horror and strategic management. Fortify your base, manage resources, and scavenge for supplies in a world overrun by monstrous creatures and corrupted by blight blooms.

name: Not Monday Cafe
description: Idle cozy restaurant management game that sits on the bottom of your screen. Create and manage your dream café. Build and customize your restaurant, grow crops, harvest your produce, and serve a variety of cuisines. Listen to jazz, chill, and transform your boring workday into a happy day.

name: Nightmare Circus
description: Nightmare Circus is an action-adventure game where the player takes on the role of a Puppeteer trapped in the Nightmare Realm. Set out on a journey to find his friends and escape the nightmare!

name: M's Cases: Chapter 1 - Vanishing of Melisma
description:
The first chapter of an adventure puzzle game. You will play as Mark, a cat detective just
starting out in a quiet little town where nothing much seems to happen. As you solve
one case after another, you'll slowly uncover the hidden mysteries that this sleepy town
has been keeping.

name: Potion Promise
description: In a medieval fantasy world, a young witch finds herself inheriting a massive debt from her parents. With only 30 days to repay it, she must rely on her potion-making skills and cunning to gather rare ingredients and fulfill the demands of her customers, while uncovering shocking truths behind.

name: Temukung: Cultivation in Drylands
description: Live on driest land in Indonesia, The Timorese adapted this difficult situation with corn’s cultivation, but the imperialism created disruption in Timor. Now get ready to manage Timor’s farming as Temukung and face many difficult situations in Timor from middle 19th century until World War II

name: Comma
description: Comma is a side-scrolling game that tells the story of a dream world where the player has to get out of there by following a mysterious figure.

name: Blades of Mirage
description: Embark on an epic isometric action RPG set in a Southeast Asian-inspired world. As Mira, use your ability to create water-based weapons and explore ancient ruins scattered across unique islands. Confront corrupted, powerful creatures and solve intricate puzzles to secure the ancient relics.

name: SoftWar Cyber Fight
description: A Science-Fiction Visual Novel Role-Playing Game with a story centered on the cyberworld conflicts. New"SoftWars" are battles involving sentient softwares namely viruses and anti-viruses, deciding the fates of computer systems.

name: Keyboard Warrior RPG
description: From the co-creator of Good Knight, master the Art of Combat Typing! Keyboard Warrior RPG is a typing game that mixes Roguelike, Dungeon RPGs, Beat Em Up, and Fighting Games in this beautifully styled game. An educational game to improve your typing skills and reading speed and learn foreign languages.

name: Khaos Tracks
description: Khaos Tracks is a high-energy rhythm game that combines heart-pounding beats, dynamic gameplay, and visually stunning neon environments. Players tap, their way through a variety of music genres, from smooth country grooves to electrifying synth melodies. With a sleek UI and bold neon accents, the game challenges players to match the rhythm of carefully crafted instrumental tracks. Featuring fast-paced action and a pulse-pounding soundtrack, Khaos Tracks is an immersive experience where every beat brings you closer to the edge of chaos.

name: Oddcore
description: A retro roguelike shooter that lets you stylistically explode your way through endless hordes of corrupted entities in a liminal nightmare.

name: Sovereign's Enigma
description: Sovereign's Enigma is a 2D platformer with survival elements, in a densely interconnected cave, where the player needs to uncover the story of an ancient civilization to solve a mystery from the past. This game is a slow and immersive experience, with a strong focus on storytelling, atmosphere, and characters.

name: Ivayami: Cradle of Fog
description: Four friends decide to visit an abandoned city. When the trip is is suddenly cut short by a car accident, Cynthia Moriyama must traverse through the dense fog of Ivayami searching for her missing friends. Beware, as the fog hides more than you imagine

name: Dominium
description: Sin descripción

name: Varg
description: A love letter to the classic MS-DOS “boomer” shooter genre, in a setting loosely inspired by Brazil's most iconic UFO case. When your son goes missing, take to the streets in search of answers. Unravel the secrets of a shadowy corporation and an alien-worshiping cult that has taken over your town.

description: After feeling marginalized by society, a young trans woman decides to venture out into the post-apocalyptic world to find a place she can call home.

name: Gyro Shooter
description: A Multiplayer motion-controlled shooting game, using your phone as a gun on a screen connected via a local network.

name: Cadeau
description: Cadeau is an RPG Horror game about a lonely, yet stubborn, young woman named Charlotte– who finds herself in a world unknown to man, wearing clothes that do not belong to her. Wonderful and tragic events are to follow suit, as all of her greatest wishes come true. However, as these things often go, her happiness does not come without consequence…

description: Sin descripción

name: Dreeg
description: Dreeg is a dimension shifting platforming adventure game where you move between 3 parallel dimensions at will to solve puzzles and take on robotic enemies. Customize Dreeg's armor to gain power and unlock new abilities and upgrades for your energy weapon system as you take on the psychotic Xel'xan.

name: Forma
description: Hunt or be hunted in Forma, an immersive sandbox RPG set in a land overrun by living emotions, where every choice shapes a dynamic living world

name: Elimora
description: Master Elemental Creatures in real-time deck-building adventure! Explore a fantasy world filled with magical creatures. Collect spirit fragments to summon and evolve companions, use cards to unleash powerful abilities, and uncover the secrets of the mystical realm to prevent its destruction.

name: Astral Break
description: Astral Break is a fusion of mech and roguelite action. Experience thrilling "thrust" controls that propel you through dynamic dungeons. Collect diverse modular armors to refine your combat style and experiment with endless synergies to craft your ultimate hero!

name: House of Arachne
description: Sin descripción

name: R/nosleep: The Night Shift at Paradise Valley Pool
description: r/nosleep is a short horror game series with episodes inspired by and adapted from posts on the r/nosleep subreddit. Night Shift at Paradise Valley Pool episode is the story of a night shift pool maintenance worker and his bizarre experiences during his first day on the job.

name: Bearly Escape
description:
Wild animals should roam free, but Kidd, a deranged scientist (the game’s antagonist), ventures into the forest to capture animals and use his twisted “X Serum,” he freezes the animals and subjects them to extraction and compression devices that strip away their consciousness, trapping it inside dolls. These dolls are then stuffed into claw machines, imprisoning the creatures in a nightmarish state.

As the protagonist, you ( a forest protection volunteer) lead a peaceful life in Everwood, a town nestled near the forest—until one day, your beloved dog, Robin, goes missing. This leads you to discover Kidd’s sinister lab, where you discover his horrific experiments. Now, it’s up to you to embark on a daring mission: free the trapped consciousness of the animals, rescue them from the claw machines, and help them escape the clutches of Kidd’s evil control, venture dangerously through forest terrane to escape, ultimately returning them to their natural habitat.

The stakes are high, and time is running out. The wild is calling. It’s time to claw your way to justice!

name: Endless Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Between These Dark Walls
description:
Things could potentially get messy tonight. I was on my way back home when some tough boys ambushed me. They weren't looking for money or anything, they just wanted to kill me right there in the street. Fortunately, I managed to run away unscathed, but these guys are still looking for me. I've managed to piece together something from rumours and hearsays; turns out Messer Beric, an usurer I've done jobs for in the past, sold me out to Raputo, one of the City Wardens, in order to prove that he'll be loyal and pay his tributes. Apparently, Beric's business collapsed with DeWall's demise, and now he seeks the protection of Raputo. Not to mention, Beric's business was run right under Raputo's nose, but he was protected by DeWall at that time. In exchange for his 'good work', Beric received a priceless necklace as a reward, and keeps it stashed in his crumbling castle in Newmarket.

Now is time for some sweet revenge; I am going to steal Beric's necklace and humiliate him; that'll teach him never to double-cross me. I should also steal some valuables along the way, just to show Raputo how I deal with his reckless threats. Raputo doesn't like independents operating within his turf, so I'll make sure to plunder the neighbourhood. I got to be careful, though. With DeWall's downfall, The City became more dangerous than ever. Thugs and assassins are on the loose in the dark, and lawmen and Hammerites prowl the streets in search of heretics and criminals alike. Cragscleft has never been so full.

name: TinkerShot
description: TinkerShot is a turned-based Spell Building rogue-like, You fight enemies by creating custom spells and launching them at enemies. Grow an arsenal of spells and items to overcome the world of TinkerShot.

name: Do Not
description: Do Not is an analog horror game set in a '90s donut fast food restaurant. You're the night shift worker at a Donut&Go on the outskirts of town. Few customers, lots of silence... but try not to die of fright!

name: Sonic Zeta Overdrive
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Travelling At Night
description: Travelling At Night is a dialogue-driven choices-matter CRPG. In the myth-scarred Europe of a very alternate Cold War, a hollow man with a shattering secret forges new goals to fill the emptiness inside. Choose sides; choose motives; choose your History.

name: Poppin & Jupa: Pocket Adventure
description: An action-adventure exploration game in which you play as a pair of young adventurers: The ladybug boy Poppin, and the scarecrow girl Jupa. Using the mysterious Gadget Box, Poppin and Jupa combat baddies, get around tricky challenges, and collect treasure as a team. In this adventure, the pair are traveling up to explore the grandiose Mount Glitteroam; what friends, foes, and secrets will they find along the way? Come and find out!

name: Rezarus
description: Rezarus is a futuristic online tank game inspired by an old world game called Tanarus. Multiplayer tank battles!

name: Secret of the Abbey
description: Embark on a journey through the underground of an 18th-century abbey. As you explore the abbey, you'll encounter a series of puzzles that reveal its mysterious past. Unravel the secrets that led to the abbey's demise in this atmospheric adventure.

name: PR: Rivenverse
description:
PR:Rivenverse is a story-focused RPG developed in RPGMaker(MV).

Taking place thousands of years after the annihilation of Humanity, focusing on a new 'elemental' based society built over the remains of the Earth, created by several Gods and ruled by its twelve Maintainers.

But we all know that there is rarely any society that thrives completely devoid of threat, as a recently formed organization known as the Fatali Stellae has been participating in a handful of questionable activities under the guise of their organization simply being business-related.
Thankfully, there are a few who are already aware of their true intentions and misdeeds, and may even soon put everything about them into light.

name: Emberfall
description:
Emberfall is the first roguevania-survivor: a roguelite, metroidvania, and survivor-inspired action-platformer.
You must extract from the deadly catacombs of the fallen citadel "Lemia" in less than 10 minutes.
Emberfall puts you in control of Kali, who defeated the God of Greed and the Goddess of Light. Now, the gods have failed, and the citadel will collapse.
Tough and fast, with snappy controls and endless challenges.
Enjoy an idling-combat system and focus on finding your way out while dodging enemies.
The game offers a simple but enjoyable roguelite system.
Purchase upgrades across your runs to become more powerful from the start.

Explore the ever-changing Limbo, defeat and collect the countless souls within, use them to expand your Domain, and dominate the Infernal Tournament with your mad soul-shuffling skills to make Hell yours!

name: Bloody Cleanup
description: A co-op roguelike horror game where you descend in an endless elevator and complete assigned tasks. Each floor brings new monsters, new locations, and new challenges.

name: Froggo's Adventure: Drifting Sky
description: Froggo's Adventure: Drifting Sky is another Simple retro 2D Platformer about Froggo on a side-scrolling adventure. Froggo had multiple dreams about seeing a mysterious figure. Wondering if any of these dreams have any meanings, Froggo goes on an adventure to find the answer...

name: Meatshot
description: MEATSHOT is a gory, action-packed shooter where you embody an unstoppable beast in a digital realm. Run along walls, dodge bullets, and pull off acrobatic gunfights in slow motion with pinpoint accuracy as you unleash carnage, taking down elite soldiers.

name: Polar Roller
description: You're a snowman's head trying to get to your body. Collect snowflakes to get bigger and snowman parts (hat, nose, etc) to be more than just a pile of snow.

name: Nina: Season of Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Mech Explorer
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, a mercenary explores the ruins of an underground city,
piloting her mech, in search of her missing partner.

name: Kiko and the Game Kids
description: Sin descripción

name: Tavern Legends
description: Tavern Legends is a medieval tavern simulation. Fulfill the needs of various patrons and design taverns according to your vision. Create your own meals, manage your inventory, and hire workers. Become a legendary tavern keeper!

name: Nippon Marathon 2: Daijoubu
description: Dash, dodge, and dive through the ultimate Japanese gameshow experience! Up to 4 contestants race through chaotic obstacle courses across Japan, filled with hilarious hazards and obscure obstacles. It’s so crazy, you’ll be shouting ‘Konnichi-what?!’ instead of ‘Konnichiwa!’

name: Haruka na Sora
description:
The censored release of the fan disc for Yosuga no Sora.
The fandisc features bonus scenarios and visual novel versions of web radio episodes. The bonus scenarios include routes for Kozue and Yahiro (who did not have routes in the original game), as well as an epilogue for Sora's main game route. Additionally, it includes a bonus scenario featuring the characters doing karaoke.

name: Zenoken
description:
A stealthy space opera metroidvania where actions have consequences.
The stars call the Chinokitsune a space pirate--& often an assassin--but stranded on a strange alien world after a failed heist, It's up to you to reckon with your own past & motivations to thwart an ancient evil & maybe find love.

name: Katana Dragon
description:
Katana Dragon is an action-RPG adventure and dungeons exploration, where you play as the ninjas Shin and Nobi in their quest to end the curse that hangs over Sogen.
Learn ninja skills, upgrade your Dragon Gems, equip the Cursed Seals and level up. Avoid traps, solve puzzles and fight powerful enemies.
Your ninja way begins!

name: Kero Quest 64
description: Kero Quest 64 is a Collectathon 3D Platformer inspired by other games in the genre, especially those from the late 90s. You take control of Kero, a blue frog seeking to stop a prince from abusing his newly gained powers by collecting Magical Shards around the kingdom.

name: Deadly Rehearsal
description: The rehearsal must be flawless. Every sound, every light timed perfectly. You are one of the best stage manager's after all. Failure is not an option. The play is cursed... and it demands perfection.

name: A Bee Movie Game But Every Time You Beat It It Gets Faster
description: Sin descripción

name: Valor of Man
description:
Valor of Man is a roguelike tactical RPG where enemies react to your actions, giving you endless chances to outsmart them with your tactics.
Valor of Man is developed by Legacy Forge, small indie studio created by 2 brothers.

name: Canvas
description: An exploration game with the core mechanic of painting the environment to alter the world. You must gain upgrades, abilities, and solve puzzles to eventually defeat the mad wizard that trapped you.

name: Oimostfonwy
description: oimostfonwy is an freeware game developed by the team ニシキガツオ (Nishikigatsuo), in which you play as seemingly an astronaut from outer space that landed in a city. There, you explore while finding different tunes to listen. There are notes explored around the world and seemly no plot or objective that the game directs the player.

name: Krampus: Night of Horror
description: Survive the longest night of your life in a haunted 18th-century orphanage where Christmas becomes a living nightmare. Krampus is hunting you, and only the power of sacred holy gloves will keep you alive.

name: Transport Simulator
description: Turn a small courier shop into a massive transport company. Hire new employees and purchase new vehicles. Negotiate different product licenses and build the most profitable system based on your strategy.

name: APUS: Bird Simulator
description: Have you ever dreamed of truly flying? Experience the raw freedom of the skies as the fastest bird in the world. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you glide through air currents and master the intricate art of flight. This isn't just a game—it's the ultimate flight experience.

name: Anime Shop Simulator
description: Manage your own anime shop . Play solo or team up with friends in 4-player co-op mode to grow your business Stock shelves with manga, figures, and collectible cards in this immersive first-person game ️.

name: Amaroo's Christmas Shop Simulator
description: Design your dream Christmas shop, make it irresistibly cozy, and watch your sales skyrocket!

name: Burger Flipper: A Fast Food Restaurant Simulator
description: Welcome to the Burger Flipper team! As our first hire, you’ll put a smile on customers’ faces as you prepare and serve their orders... And clean the kitchen and stock inventory. But we promote within! One day, you’ll be the manager, hiring new flippers, purchasing equipment, and choosing the menu!

name: Bunker Constructor Simulator
description: A simulator in which you have to build bunkers. Complete contracts from the city government and citizens to earn money to buy your own house and build your own protected underground bunker.

name: Bowling Simulator
description: Bowling Simulator is a realistic bowling game where you’ll feel like a pro landing strikes, thanks to its easy to use controls. Grab your favorite drink and hit the lanes at Nashville Bowling Center, where bowling isn’t just a game—it’s life!

name: Bloody Bar Simulator
description: In this fantastical world where creatures and humans coexist, open your own bar. The customers of this bar aren't humans, but creatures. Hunt humans to cook meals. Order ingredients from merchants. Prepare the orders given by your customers. Earn money and develop your bar however you like.

name: Motorcycle Sales Simulator
description: Bike Sales Simulator is a simulation game full of realistic trading mechanics, inviting players into the exciting world of a motorcycle trader. Research prices, negotiate, find the best deals and grow your own shop!

name: Bike Park Simulator: BMX, Dirt Jump & MTB
description: Bike Park Simulator is a realistic BMX, Dirt Jump, and MTB simulation featuring a large sandbox skatepark, multiple bike types, and fun physics-based riding. Perform tricks, explore diverse terrains, and become the most famous biker in the city!

name: Beach Outlet Simulator
description: Run your retail company. Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products, meet customer needs, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Hire new workers, expand your store, and enjoy the growth of your retail company.

name: Bath House Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in a working bath house, where you're responsible for cleaning all clients ranging from Spirits to Warriors and General Guests. Using and upgrading a variety of tools, you're responsible for making sure every client leaves feeling fresh and cleaned of all mud, grime, and gunk!

name: Blacksmith Simulator
description: Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op is a medieval simulation that combines survival, building, and trade. Gather wood and ore to develop your base and character, forge powerful weapons, and survive across three regions themed around Snow, Castles, and Egypt. Fight monsters and grow through trade!

name: Chart Trading Simulator
description: Trade stocks, Earn money, Level up. Trade more stocks, Earn more money, and Level up again. Start your journey as a stock trader and accumulate as much wealth as possible to beat inflation and survive in the brutal market.

name: Car Service Simulator
description: Car Service Simulator is a car service business simulation game where you start from scratch and work your way up. Take the chance to successfully run your own service center, offering a wide range of services from car repair to painting and modification.

name: Bus Flipper Simulator
description: Have you ever wondered “What if I buy an old bus and convert it into a camper? Or maybe a cafe on wheels?”. This bus conversion simulator will give you that! You will get a variety of different buses and vans to convert. Clean, destroy, create, customize, test it, sell and make profit!

name: Café Manager Simulator
description: Unleash your inner entrepreneur! Balance renovation, product selection, customer service, and outdoor ambiance to build the ultimate café experience and keep your customers coming back for more.

name: CamGirl Simulator
description: Step into the tantalizing world of online entertainment with "CamGirl Simulator"! This immersive simulation game puts you in control of your own virtual cam model career. Experience the highs and lows of the industry as you navigate the challenges and rewards of being a popular camgirl.

name: Car Carrier Simulator
description: Transport vehicles across cities while managing your time efficiently. Carefully load and unload cars and navigate through challenging routes. Earn money, hire employees, upgrade your truck, tackle increasingly complex missions. Experience realistic driving mechanics and dynamic weather conditions!

name: Champion Simulator
description: Start as a novice boxer training at home. Earn money and respect in street fights, then upgrade to a real gym for better results. With enough progress, get a pro card to enter tournaments. Your goal? To rise through the ranks and become the CHAMPION! Ready to prove yourself?

name: Desert of Ash: a Post-Apocalyptic Gay Sex Simulator
description: The world has burnt to ash. Wander the wasteland, scavenge and trade for vital supplies, hook up with over a dozen hot guys, develop relationships—however fleeting—and decide how you want to live in this new world.

name: Corner Kitchen Fast Food Simulator
description: Buy cooking equipment, prepare delicious meals, and serve hungry customers. Upgrade your setup, read customer reviews, and expand your business to become the top fast-food joint in the city.

name: CoffeeShop Simulator
description: CoffeeShop Simulator offers a captivating experience for aspiring baristas and fans of simulation games. It's more than just management every decision shapes your journey in the exciting world of coffee.

name: Coindice Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Electrician Simulator VR
description: Electrician Simulator goes VR! Experience the game like never before. Change bulbs, fix outlets, and have fun with cables and wires. Just remember to kill the power first. Electrocution might feel very real in VR!

name: Driving Simulator
description: This game is set in a city of around 18 square kilometers in which the objective is to run people over and cause as much chaos as you can.

name: Drive Thru Simulator
description: Drive Thru is a simulation game that immerses you in the exciting world of fast food restaurant management. Take customer orders, prepare their meals, process payments, and expand your restaurant!

name: Dream Bar Simulator
description: Become the Owner of Your Own Dream Bar! Create unique cocktails. Manage bar resources, buy alcohol and consumables. Expand and customize your bar, buy furniture and interior items, create the most comfortable atmosphere for your clients. Hire unique employees.Reach the top of the bar industry.

name: DMT Simulator
description: ascend the tunnel encounter entities will you portal home or stay trapped in eternity?

name: Factory Simulator: Clothing & Outlet
description: Become an entrepreneur with Factory Simulator: Clothing & Outlet - an immersive first-person simulator which lets you open and manage a factory and shop. Design your own products or use existing licenses, expand your facilities, hire workers, and customize your retail space.

name: EV Station Simulator
description: Become the owner of an electric vehicle charging station. Serve customers, do minor car repairs, invest in renewable energy sources and manage energy consumption.

name: Erotic Shop Simulator
description: This game is a sex shop management simulation game. In the game, you can open a sex shop, make sales, interact with customers, navigate the map, and perform tasks.

name: Gamba Simulator
description: Become a Gamba(gambling addict) who is stuck in a city which is partially controlled by mafia. Mine, distribute bills, gamble and make money to escape the city.

name: Fred Johnson's: Mech Simulator
description: Fred Johnson's: Mech Simulator is an open-world mech game that blends light RPG mechanics with twin-stick action to create a unique and thrilling experience.

name: Football Pitch Simulator
description: Manage your own football pitch complex! Repair and upgrade the pitches. Run a mini market, organize the relaxation areas, and create an enjoyable atmosphere with gaming zones. Growing your business is entirely in your hands!

name: Forest Simulator 2025
description: Have you ever wanted to be part of a forest of trees? Now you can be! Stand very still! Look at the beautiful (low poly) scenery! MMOF (Massive Multiplayer Online Forest)! BECOME a tree (in a simulation)!

name: Football Life Simulator
description: Live the life of a professional footballer both on and off the field. Train, play matches, manage your social life, climb the career ladder, and spend your earned money. Decorate your life with luxury while managing your relationships and finances.

name: Finnish Pub Simulator
description: Run your very own pub in the Finnish countryside either on your own or with friends! Manage your pub's inventory, set your own prices, and be ready to refuse service if things get too crazy.

name: Fighting Simulator
description: This is a VR game in which you fight waves of enemies, however you want. Use your fists or gadgets to help you win. Unlock new abilities, and level up your character.

name: Gun Store Simulator
description: Take control of a gun store in Gun Store Simulator and manage every aspect of the arms trading business. Buy licenses, select products, hire staff, and ensure safety to grow your store and build a successful chain. Can you dominate the market?

name: Gun Factory Simulator
description: Take control of your very own firearms factory. Start with a workshop and a gun shop, and evolve it into a factory of mass destruction. Craft bullets to rockets, handguns to shotguns, design your own weapons, and become a merchant of death. Get use to the smell of gunpowder and cash.

name: Grocery Store Simulator
description: Build, manage, and grow your own grocery store empire! Step into this exciting retail simulation adventure and experience the challenges and rewards of running your very own store.

name: Go-Kart Simulator
description: Build Your Go-Kart Empire!  Start with a small business, expand your fleet, upgrade your track, and secure big sponsorship deals to boost your profits. Host tournaments, grow your brand, and become a racing legend. Take the wheel and push your limits on the track!

name: Goal Poacher VR: Football Header Simulator
description: Become a top-class striker in an immersive football experience, where you score breathtaking headers against world-class defenders and goalkeepers.

name: Joey's Shisha Simulator
description: Start your own shisha lounge from scratch! Prepare hookahs, work behind the bar, serve customers, manage finances, design your shop and expand your business. But beware, unexpected events can happen, can your business overcome them?

name: Illegal Dealership Simulator
description: Navigate the cutthroat automotive world by buying, modifying, and selling cars for profit. Whether you build a legal empire or risk it all in the underworld of car theft and illegal activities, your choices shape your destiny. Will you rise as a legit dealer or dominate the shadows?

name: Frosty Enterprise
description: Manage your own ice cream truck. Enter your truck and start your business. Buy fruits, syrups and other ingredients to make ice cream. Add new setups to your truck to sell milkshake, float, sundae. Research new flavors to attract more people and grow your business.

name: Hotdog Simulator
description: Hotdog Simulator is the most absurd simulation game ever! Start with a cart, upgrade to a van, or even buy a restaurant. Along the way, you'll face arguments, wild fights, and even baguette battles. It’s all about making hotdogs—how absurd could it be? Play and find out!

name: Hot Dog Simulator
description: Start your own hot dog stand business, find the perfect spots in the city, upgrade your stands, attend festivals, and serve influencers. Expand your business by opening new branches and perfecting your hot dogs.

name: Hell Yeah Simulator
description: Do you want to fly over beautiful landscapes, smoke a cigarette, gamble and kill people at the same time? Here is HELL YEAH Simulator You can do whatever you want and whatever seems cool to you in this game. You can run in dywars, you can get your lost speed, you can bunny hop, you can backhopping.

name: Hand Cooking Simulator: Multi-Chef
description: A fun physics based hand simulator in which you prepare food.

name: Mall Simulator
description: Turn your shop from a small shopping center into a huge city mall! To avoid going bankrupt, you'll need to negotiate new store deals, set good prices and keep up with trends. Upper floors, cleaning, shoplifters and security are upcoming.

name: Make the Border Great Again: Visa Officer Simulator
description: Play as a visa officer in this chaotic simulator! Inspect passports, catch lies, and decide who crosses the border. But watch out—one bad stamp, and you're in jail! Test your wits in this hilarious battle of logic and deception.

name: Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator
description: Explore and survive the harsh American wilderness in the Long Drive North. Drive and repair your trusty old RV, scavenge for parts, hunt and cook to survive; all alone or with up to 4 players in co-op. No zombies or monsters await – just an immersive driving-exploration-survival experience.

name: Liquor Store Simulator
description: Open your own Liquor Store! Buy goods, manage your store, hire staff. Who knows, maybe you will be able to make a real alcohol empire out of a small store.

name: Liquor And Wine Shop Simulator: Store Simulator
description: Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator is a store management game that takes place in the charming streets of France where you run your own Liquor shop! Start small as a cashier, scanning items and giving the correct change to your customers, then work your way up to managing a full-fledged business.

name: Laundry Simulator 2025
description: Laundry Simulator 2025 is a chill, ASMR laundry cleaning, and shop management game. Open your own Laundromat, and deal with dirty clothes and customers. Clean and manage your shop, upgrade your equipment to improve your clientele to celebrities. Your laundry empire awaits!

name: Laundry Service Simulator
description: Turn your place from a tiny laundromat into a big laundry service center! You will need to buy new machines, deliver orders fast, upgrade your equipment and keep everything clean to avoid going bankrupt. Laundry design, employees, deep dry clean and security are coming up.

name: Ore Market Masters Simulator
description: ORE MARKET MASTERS SIMULATOR: Turn raw ore into riches! Start with a pickaxe and a dream, then grow your mining operation into a sprawling empire with automation, savvy strategy, and bustling commerce.

name: Office Simulator
description: Ready to climb the career ladder? In Office Simulator, start as an intern and rise through the corporate ranks. Gain experience, earn promotions, and when the time comes, launch your own company to begin a new business adventure.

name: Nightclub Manager Simulator
description: Create your own nightclub! Serve drinks, keep it clean, sell illegal goods, decorate your club and much more!

name: Monster Care Simulator
description: Become the manager of a care center for adorable little monsters in Monster Care Simulator. Earn money by meeting their needs, improve your facilities, and customize the environment to provide the best care and see the creatures thrive.

name: Mini Racer Car Shop Simulator
description: Manage your mini racer car shop, sell mini cars and spare parts, and unleash your creativity with custom builds. Test drive your creations on the race track before putting them up for sale. Transform your shop into a haven for mini car enthusiasts and build a thriving business in the process!

name: Meowingtons Simulator
description: This isn’t your typical dance game...Explore club Oberhasli and Control meowingtons' movements, every dance is an opportunity to create something unique, funny, or downright absurd. Whether you’re bouncing around on the decks, or find a better place to throw down, there’s no wrong way to dance. neat

name: Pizza Simulator Together
description: Pizza Simulator is a cooperative simulator where you manage a pizzeria, set up the kitchen, hire staff, prepare and deliver orders, and maintain the reputation and cleanliness of your establishment. Create your dream pizzeria!

name: Pirate Cove Simulator
description: Pirate Cove Simulator will have you run a shop and tavern on the Island of the Damned, to get rich and buy your way out of the pirate afterlife. Trade with restless undead pirates, run your own distillery and turn local plants into potent drinks, search for hidden treasures, or just go fishing.

name: Parisian Brasserie Simulator
description: Manage your own brasserie in Paris and turn it into the place to be! Create menus, serve customers, and master every detail to grow your restaurant. Manage supplies, ensure top-notch service, and make your mark on the city of lights. Will you become the next Parisian brasserie institution?

name: Parking Attendant Simulator
description: Inherit a run-down parking lot from a relative and turn it into a mass-transit hub for all classes of people. Extend and upgrade services to attract new customers and keep their precious vehicles safe.

name: Recycle Factory Simulator
description: Buy junk, recycle and sell! Unlock new machines, produce products and upgrade your factory! "Recycle Factory Simulator" is a first-person simulator game where you work in your own recycle factory.

name: Randomly Jerk Simulator
description: "Randomly Jerk Simulator" is a roguelite simulation game that uses a slot machine to simulate the parasitic behavior of a jerk who relies on his parents. This game does not contain any gambling behavior or cash transactions.

name: Potion Shopkeeper Simulator
description: Potion Shopkeeper is a cozy 3D game where you run a potion shop, craft potions, set prices, and manage customer reactions. Unlock rare ingredients, experiment with recipes, and manage your reputation to attract more customers and grow your shop!

name: Post Office Simulator
description: You are the new postal worker! Serve customers by sending and receiving packages and letters. Check the contents of boxes for prohibited items. Every decision you make has consequences. Decide whose side you're on.

name: Politburo Simulator
description: Politburo Simulator is a turn-based strategy game where you take on the role of the General Secretary in a fictional Communist country. Manage your Politburo, make critical decisions, and navigate a web of political events to maintain control over the nation and defend the Revolution.

name: Roots and Recipes: Farm and Restaurant Simulator
description: Grow crops, cook meals, and manage your restaurant in a colorful low-poly world! Balance farming and cooking, expand your farm, and delight customers with fresh, delicious dishes.

name: Rocket Simulator
description: Travel with your spacecraft throughout the solar system based on realistic Kepler's laws of gravity. Invent your own routes between planets, use gravity, explore space, trade, upgrade your spaceship and enjoy the beautiful scenery!

name: Robot Fury: Mech Combat Simulator
description: Robot Fury is a mech combat simulator where you can feel like a true robot warrior. Fight enemies with a powerful flamethrower, soar into battle with your jetpack, and finish off foes with precise machine gun headshots. Customize your mech and engage in exhilarating, epic battles!

name: RKN Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Resort Hotel Simulator
description: Hotel Owner Simulator is a hotel management game where you start from a small hotel and grow your business by creating beautifully designed rooms, adjusting room sizes and layouts by placing each individual wall, negotiating high prices, and expanding your empire. Lets build, and manage the resort.

name: ShoppingMall: Manager Simulator
description: Build your dream shopping empire from the ground up! Design, decorate, and attract top tenants. Keep customers thrilled, maximize profits, and dominate the industry. Can you become the ultimate shopping center tycoon? Start now and watch your empire thrive!

name: Shooting Range Owner Simulator
description: Run and develop your own Shooting Range and reach more and happy customers!

name: Street Food Simulator
description: Welcome to the bustling world of street food! Grill hot dogs, sizzle hamburgers, and serve delicious snacks to hungry customers. Find best spot in the city, perfect your recipes, manage your stand and watch your reputation grow!

name: Streamer Manager Simulator
description: Living in the same apartment with an aspiring streamer... What could possibly go wrong?

name: Storefront Simulator
description: Build your retail empire! Tired of playing by someone else's rules? Design, build, stock, and manage your own retail paradise, from a humble corner shop to a sprawling commercial enterprise. Create a unique shopping experience and become a retail legend. Your customers are waiting!

name: Speedboat Simulator
description: Speedboat Simulator is a realistic speedboat racing game where you pilot high-speed boats, customize their colors, and compete in thrilling races. Navigate through Hawaiian waters, and make a splash when you reach the finish line!

name: Spaceflight Simulator 2
description: Build rockets and fly them around the Solar System in this realistic aerospace sandbox. Attempt landings, build space stations, drive rovers, perform spacewalks, explore alien worlds, and get your crew home safe.

name: Snow Resort Simulator
description: Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.

name: Soccer Pro Simulator
description: Soccer Pro Simulator is a realistic football (soccer) simulation designed to make you feel like a rockstar, making the crowd roar after scoring amazing goals. From powerful midfield shots to spectacular bicycle kicks, experience the thrill of becoming a true legend!

name: The Tavern Tales: Medieval Simulator
description: The Tavern Tales is a first-person medieval simulator! Start with an inherited tavern and turn it into a thriving business. Serve customers acquire titles, upgrade your tavern, and expand your holdings. Explore opportunities, open new businesses, engage in politics, and interact with town residents.

name: TechStop Simulator
description: Prepare for an immersive retro arcade & game shop management experience. Take control of your very own TechStop! Stock your shelves with games and arcade classics, set prices, manage payments, hire staff, expand & design your store to attract more customers. Stay ahead in competitive local market!

name: Tech Market Simulator
description: Build and manage your own tech store! Sell products like keyboards, mice, and gaming chairs. Hire employees, grow your shop, and make it the best place for gamers to shop. Can you become the top tech store?

name: Tea House Simulator
description: Offer a warm tea experience while keeping up with the dynamic flow of the city. Step out of being an ordinary business owner and get ready for a simulation where you set the rhythm of the city!

name: Supermarket Surviving Simulator
description: Want to relax after a tough day? Probably not going to happen. In this hardcore and immersive simulator, you’ll experience all the pain of managing your own store. Start with just one dollar in your account and bankrupt your competitors.

name: Supermarket Simulator Pro
description: Run your own supermarket! Buy, stock, and sell items, expand your store, and manage customers. Customize your layout, explore new locations, and hire staff. Keep things fresh with variety and new challenges as you grow your business.

name: Top Burger Shop Simulator
description: In Top Burger Shop, whip up delicious burgers to satisfy hungry customers in a vibrant, fast-paced environment! Manage your shop, unlock new ingredients, and navigate fun challenges across 180 levels. Are you ready to delight your patrons?

name: Title Screen Simulator
description: A title screen turned into a game! Yes you read it correctly, probably...

name: Thrift Store Simulator
description: Thrift Store Simulator, you own and operate a second-hand store in a bustling city. Customers will bring a variety of items to your shop, and it’s your job to negotiate the best prices. With over 150+ unique items, each with its own bargaining value, every negotiation is a new challenge.

name: Vacation Cafe Simulator
description: Cozy Italian Vacation Cafe ️ No timers, No stress cook traditional dishes upgrade and customize just drink prosecco, relax and grow your dream cafe

name: Unemployment Simulator 2018
description: A social welfare survival horror based on real events. Endure emotional pain, crushing pressure of adulthood and societal expectations while evading a literal death by boredom. Battle demons, hide from skeletons, keep your bathroom clean. Uncover a dark mystery and emerge as a hero.

name: Unemployment Simulator
description: Navigate the challenges of life without a job in Unemployment Simulator, a first-person survival experience where you manage your day-to-day needs, search for work, and try to stay afloat. Balance basic needs like food, hygiene, and sanity while facing the harsh realities of unemployment.

name: Trash Buster Simulator
description: Join the adventure of cleaning the world! Clean dirty beaches, parks, and cities. Broadcast on social media to raise donations and grow your team. Lead a global environmental movement. Change the world with every cleanup!

name: Wood Shop Simulator
description: Chop trees, craft amazing wood pieces, and grow your workshop! Whether you're playing it safe in the woods or risking it all in the city, your skills and reputation will shape your success. Upgrade your tools, hire a team, and auction your creations to become the top woodworker around!

name: Weed Lord Simulator
description: Grow, trim, and sell your way to becoming the ultimate cannabis kingpin. Expand your empire, hire dealers, and dominate the underground market!

name: Wheelchair Simulator
description: Wheelchair Life Sim where mastering control and speed is key to overcoming outrageous obstacles! Even the simplest movements can be your greatest challenge.

name: Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream
description: Workaholic Simulator is a first person immersive psychological horror game. It's a short, disturbing and surreal experience about working in our contemporary world.

name: Zoomer Simulator
description: Explore unorthodox locations and meet avant-garde characters (in no way inspired by real-life personalities or events) in an indie RPG written like a road movie if a road movie was written like an indie RPG (it's not like a road movie).

name: Graduation Life Simulator
description: Graduation Life Simulator "is a simple and casual 2D simulation business development game. Here, you will transform into a newly graduated college student, bringing dreams and challenges to the big city, striving to accumulate wealth from scratch, with the ultimate goal of earning 10 million yuan!

name: Melee Spaceship
description: Melee Spaceship is a top-down shooter roguelite where you control a spaceship with...no guns?! To survive the invasion you must smash enemies while dodging danger to earn cash and unlock new powers and abilities for a variety of unique builds.

name: Youxing Continent
description: Youxing Continent "is a fantasy style open world massively multiplayer online role-playing game, where the world economy is completely driven by players. It features a novel and interesting build equipment system, excellent social interaction, and exciting PVP and PVE.

name: Dead, Too Dead
description: Dead, too dead is an open-world survival game where an ordinary person from the 21st century is summoned to a fantasy world on the brink of apocalypse. Use any means necessary to survive in this world. Just remember one thing: you are not a legend. You are just an ordinary person.

name: Buster Jam
description: Buster Jam is a comedic, fast-paced minigame frenzy full of wonderfully wacky characters. Its early 2000s style and soundtrack take full advantage of its rich story and hilarious visuals.

name: SteamMaze
description: Open world, rich gameplay, picking up garbage, driving trains, traps, catching, cooking. Concepts and impacts such as food chain systems, weather, physical and chemical logic. All living beings have SAN values and intelligence. As a survival adventure game, it offers unlimited expansion content!

name: Trait
description: Harness the power of the elements in an exhilarating 2D Metroidvania adventure! Traverse a plague-stricken kingdom, face deadly foes, and uncover the truth behind a devastating storm. With handcrafted environments and challenging combat, shape your destiny in a world teetering on the edge of ruin.

name: Soulfall
description: Descend into Hell and reclaim your soul in this fast-paced Action RPG roguelike where your choices shape your destiny. Create your hero, pick your class, and fight your way through hordes of demons, slimes, and skeletons in a journey of vengeance and redemption.

name: Eclipse Casino
description: Gamble your way out of Eclipse Casino fighting 30+ bosses, learning 50+ skills, and meeting or recruiting over 100 different characters! A challenging roguelike turn-based rpg where you must escape the Shady Casino Owner by fighting and gambling your way out!

name: Word Rave
description: Word Rave is a fast-paced word game with a killer soundtrack. Form words quickly in thrilling "Rave" mode or chill out with increasing difficulty in "Chill" mode. Featuring a cute cat mascot, get ready to unleash your inner wordsmith!

name: Blocktopia
description: Blocktopia is a vibrant and humorous clicker city-builder game. Gather resources, build your town, and defend it against nightly raids! In this chaotic world where justice prevails, survive and dive into a fun city-building experience!

name: Just a Little Purr Suit
description: In Just a Little Purr_suit, use cards to guide the kitten along the path. Use cannons, trampolines, and even interdimensional portals to reach the bird as quickly as possible and scare it away.

name: Pixel Frenzy
description: Pixel Frenzy is a fast-paced first-person shooter game where you create your own combat style in fully destructible environments. Defeat the pixel monsters invading the real world. Grab your weapon and save the world by destroying everything in your path!

name: GrimmKitchen
description: This game is an action simulation that allows players to enjoy two different genres: an "Action Part" where you gather ingredients in a fairy tale world, and a "Management Part" where you run a restaurant using the ingredients you've collected.

name: Invariant
description: As Nabla Station’s search for energy beneath the Antarctic ice spirals into chaos, a scientist must take on rogue AI, strange creatures, and deranged colleagues using inventive tools, powerful weapons, and quick thinking to uncover the station’s secrets and reclaim control.

name: House of Horror: Outside is Better
description: House of Horror: Outside is better" is a first-person psychological horror video game that offers an immersive and terrifying experience. With the help of your wits and strength, and a dynamo flashlight, explore the facilities of the house of horror, solve puzzles, and try to get out of it alive.

name: Wyrmhall: Brush and Banter
description: Meet quirky characters and clean strange artifacts in this short cozy comedy game. From an enchanted teacup to a cursed skull with a chip on its shoulder, each item and client brings new twists and surprises.

name: Monkeround
description: A fast-paced side-scrolling shooter about primates getting access to weaponry way above their paygrade.

name: Costume Curse
description: An Action-Command RPG where Halloween costumes become a reality

name: Technically Frogs Can Fly
description: Hustle as a frog, catching bugs, mining, gambling, and more to dodge crushing child support debt!

name: War Rats: The Rat em Up
description: Be a rat. Kill the rats. Sidescrolling shooter meets tower defence with a sprinkle of RPG elements. A hand-drawn rat-filled side-scrolling looter-shooter moba-lite 2D gore-fest inspired by that brutal 90s gaming feel of yore.

name: 3Dash
description: 3Dash, a three-dimensional autoscrolling platformer. Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

name: Saihate Station
description: An exploration/horror/adventure game about the codependent, love-hate relationship between two men.

name: Black Armor: Battle For Survivors
description:
In a world on the brink of chaos, Black Armor, Spicy, Charlie and other heroes fight to maintain balance, while the Grim Reaper and his dark forces threaten to destroy everything. Prepare for a story full of bravery, betrayal and redemption, where every fight counts.

Experience the most visceral and challenging combat. Don't miss it!

name: Work In Progress
description:
It’s your first day in office, half of the staff is on burnout and the other half is already AFFLICTED.
Seems familiar ?... I know !
In Work In Progress, eliminate all that threatens the WAY, so you can once more perform your capitalist duties in peace !
An action Roguelite tainted with mysteries.

An impactful ACTION gameplay !

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Ki
description: Sin descripción

name: To Eat A God
description:
Here is the game called "To eat a god"

"You will control a puppet during your stay in the game, you must blend in with your role to prevent a break with the continuity of the game itself and with the psyche of the characters within it....

The game has 3 characters that you can choose.... although with one of them you have to unlock a dialogue first before you can play it... haha

description: Sin descripción

name: Combi Ring Advanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Stella Sora
description: Stella Sora is a top-down, light-action adventure game developed by YOSTAR.

name: Olaf the Boozer
description: Help a hungover dwarf piece together his wild night out! Olaf the Boozer is basically fantasy The Hangover as a sokoban game. You investigate the consequences of your epic pub crawl, fixing what can be fixed and making amends along the way. There’s a bit of mystery, one very angry chicken, and a nice time-bending twist on classic gameplay that keeps Olaf fresh.

name: Omega Phenex Commenced Project Six
description: You will become a pilot of the mech “Icarus,” which has tremendous maneuverability. You will enjoy a fight and face large powerful armies and rivals by moving from skimming the surface of the sea to the cloud with Icarus. This game is a high-speed mech shooting game capable of firing massive amounts of missiles.

name: Fuuraiki
description: Sin descripción

name: Karen Ready！
description: You run your own perfume store as the owner of a perfume store. A sudden accident has involved you in the investigation of your own resurrection from the dead. The truth gradually emerges with three employees - a love affair about perfume. Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!

name: Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate
description: "Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate" is a romance visual novel game. On your usual way home, you come across a runaway girl on the roadside. What follows is a heart-pounding cohabitation, and a gradual revelation of the girl's mysterious past.

name: Linesgo
description: Based on hardcore logic, break out of the box and solve "impossible" problems! By tapping to guide the red square forward, the blue will follow you in the opposite direction - there is only one condition for victory: make the three squares connected by a straight line contain red, yellow, and blue.

name: Haunting Record: Phantom Street
description: You find yourself on a street both unfamiliar and strangely familiar, where eerie events unfold one after another. Restless spirits linger here, their resentment palpable, as if waiting to drag you into the abyss…

name: Kuroshiro no Avesta: Refusal Kyozetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Logic Mahjong Souryuu
description: Sin descripción

name: 10min Heroes
description: A 2D pixel survival game where you defeat waves of enemies and aim for the goal. Face over 50 types of enemies, wield 20+ unique weapons, and grow stronger as you progress through each stage. "Become stronger and reach the goal!"

name: Denbora
description: Leap through time in Denbora, a darkly humorous 3D puzzle game. Navigate intricate puzzles and unravel the cyclical nature of the labor market, guided by a sarcastically witty AI. Each decision echoes through past and future!

name: 1000: The All-Mother's Embrace
description:
The washed-out red line traces a confident path away from the labyrinth city, toward the lands of dreams strewn with golden petals.
Were that line to break, a story would start. A story of the boundless and the omnipotent, of the minuscule and the fragile.

name: Mini Dungeon
description: Explore "mini dungeons" in search of treasures while facing unique creatures in this action roguelike where you create your own weapons and strategies.

name: 3-Bit Explorer
description: 3-Bit Explorer follows its predecessors, being a game focused on world exploration. This time you find yourself lost in a forest that seems to have even more bits than you, making this world even stranger to our hero. Once more, the world does not need saving, but you need to find your way home (and also a good adventure).

name: Tinkerlands
description: Explore, craft, and fight your way on the uncharted islands solo or in co-op! Tinkerlands is an exciting survival adventure where you will build your settlement, craft useful tools to survive, and even use magic!

name: Crystal Rail
description:
A rail-roguelike train game with a handpainted artstyle set in a crystalpunk fantasy world. Create a train and make deliveries to strike it rich, but every few turns, a revolution overthrows the government, changes the rules and eliminates the poorest teams! Last one standing wins!

Taking equal inspiration from roguelike deckbuilders and modern board games, Crystal Rail offers an addictive, unique spin on the strategy roguelike, with a cast of iconic conductors all based on extinct animals.

name: Outsiders
description: In this co-op Survival Horror game, two shipwrecked survivors are stranded on an uncharted island, facing terrifying creatures and puzzles. Work together to explore, survive, and uncover the island's dark secrets before it consumes you both.

name: Cluck and Conquer
description: Command an army of battle-ready chickens in this roguelite, micro-focused RTS. Hatch new units, expand your numbers and upgrade your flock into an unstoppable clucking force of destruction!

name: Glintseeker Island
description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons, uncover exciting secrets, excavate countless treasures, and fight enemies and bosses. Save the island from a mysterious threat below!

name: Tides of Lava
description: A strategic tower defense roguelike game with a grid-based building system and constantly changing enemy paths and environments. Manage your builders efficiently to defend your base against a variety of enemies. Adaptiveness is key to winning - do you have what it takes?

name: Low Poly Stories: Mist
description: Low Poly Stories: Mist is an action-adventure RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Explore, fight, and survive are your main objectives as you uncover the truth behind the mist that shrouds the kingdom.

name: Project: Amica
description: Project: AMICA is a first person shooter built in the GZDoom engine. You play the role of SID, an android set out to defeat General Genant Kekaha in order to prevent further military conflict. Explore a colorful 90's inspired world of robots, cool power ups and weapons! Collect power ups that change the way you tackle combat scenarios and exploration. Revisit areas you've already been to and explore new paths and secrets that'll help you throughout your journey!

name: Claire a la Mode
description: Team up with a friend or go it alone into a sugar-high adventure! Bake your dessert masterpiece and collect new bakers as you rise through a high-stakes bake-off full of cheaters. Fend off their decadent lackeys and against all odds, come out on top in a worldwide baking frenzy!

name: Ogre Man
description: Ogre Man is a challenging retro inspired 2d Action Platformer. You get to pick the order of the levels, and earn new abilities from defeated bosses. It has fun original characters and music.

name: Need Two Survive
description: horror co-op game, try to escape from the horrible death trap of the mad scientist: Pas Fin. A portal and SAW inspired game that will put your nerves and trust in your friend at edge. good luck you stinky peasents

name: What's a King to a God
description: You are a begrudging hero who has just overthrown God and must assume the role yourself. Manipulate heroes, monsters, and locations across the map to keep the realm at peace while building enough resources to stop the cycle of Chaos once and for all.

name: Great Powers At War
description: Create your hero, lead a legendary fantasy faction, and conquer your foes in strategic turn-based hex combat. Oversee economy maintenance, technology research, and hero progression to ensure your people dominate their rivals across worlds near and far.

name: Steel Swarm: Apocalypse
description: SSA is a next-gen MOBA: 5 vs 5 players fight in 3 lanes to destroy enemy HQ. Yet, SSA advances the genre: Battle enemy heroes weaving through swarms, explore the jungle accomplishing missions, enhance your build with mods and upgrades, and demolish the city to forge new paths altering the map.

name: The Fisherman: A Codfish Tale
description: Set in 1942 during World War II, experience the challenges and homesickness faced by the sailors as they navigate the Greenland Seas to fish cod. Immerse yourself in an emotional narrative with dialogues in authentic old Portuguese slang and fulfill the duties of a traditional fisherman as you unravel the tragic fate of the ship.

name: LepozhdianVibe
description:
Lepozhdian Vibe is an immersive simulator inspired by the synthwave aesthetic and the 1980s. It's a game where creativity and freedom take center stage. We offer a variety of modes: sandbox, classic shooters, arcade racing, social dynamic modes like Mafia, and even an editor where you can create your own maps, stories, and worlds.

Lepozhdian presents a unique game that knows it’s a game. In this experience, reality and the game world intertwine, breaking the fourth wall. Characters discuss their roles, the game’s rules, and even address the player directly, creating an unforgettable experience. It’s more than a game — it’s a reflection on what a game truly is.

There are no strict boundaries in the game. Want to build a city? Go ahead. Prefer competition? Host races or battles with friends. It's all up to you.

Our game supports multiplayer, style customization, and VR. Want to play in your own atmosphere, with personalized interface settings and weapons? No problem. Most importantly, we've added modding capabilities through a built-in programming language. Everything you need for creativity is already in the game.

Lepozhdian Vibe is a free game with no microtransactions. However, the project's support relies entirely on you. Subscribe to our Patreon if you'd like to help us make the game even better.

This format allows us to continually develop and improve the game, respond promptly to your feedback, add new content, fix bugs, and implement innovative ideas. This gives us the flexibility to keep the game fresh and engaging for you over a long period of time.

We are confident that this approach will allow us to create something truly special and captivating. Together with you, we can develop a game that will bring joy for years to come.

name: Seal of Solitomb
description: Use your solitaire skills to assemble sweet combos and defeat the dungeon's monsters. Grab treasure and spend it on powerful, synergistic abilities. Manage both your own resources and the demon's patience to hopefully survive the ordeal.

name: Knuckles Treasure Hunt

name: Golf With Your Friends 2
description: Tee off in Golf With Your Friends 2! Dive into 12-player chaos, wild new course mechanics, a revamped level editor, and nonstop fun—play together no matter how and where your friends play!

name: Sonic Neo Genesis
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Axiom
description: Sin descripción

name: Chaos Control

name: Sonic Switch

name: CloserLook VR: Oldway
description: CLoserLook: Old Ways, a captivating interactive story VR adventure game set in modern day west Africa. Awakening in a locked university administrative building, you'll need to solve a series of intricate puzzles to find your way out. As you navigate through the game, explore secret locations and uncover a gripping narrative that delves into themes of exploitation, corruption, and betrayal.

name: TailScape: The corgi’s Advendture
description: Tailscape is a Metroidvania game starring a cute puppy. Solve hidden puzzles and sometimes face large enemies to fill in the story of the bond between humans and animals.

name: Pet'n'Run
description: Pet’n’Run is a Mixed Reality game where you take control of your favorite animals and pet them through levels full of crazy obstacles and challenges.

name: The Patient: Can you escape?
description: The Patient is a classic escape game in ego perspective where you find yourself in a Sanatorium in the 1930s. Explore the mysterious location and solve cunning Puzzles to progress further. But stay alert, you are not alone! Will you be able to find your way out?
