name: Mars Explorer
description:
Mars Explorer is an online game for multiple players that combines racing, dogfights and exploration all set on the deserted landscape of the planet Mars. Choosing between a buggy and a hovercraft, the game offers rocky landscapes to explore, with volcanoes, elevated plateaus and lava flows.

There is free exploration, but also game modes such as laser tag or foxholes (reach the highest speed). Different camera perspectives are combined with the option to fly. When riding up a hill at a high speed, the buggy can extend its flaps to fly. This can be combined with shooting from a first person perspective, either using the mouse of the keyboard to combine these actions.

The game mechanics are introduced on a tutorial map and players can then join servers set up by others, or create a new server and optionally add AI-controlled bots. Players can chat while playing using text and the graphics scale back and forth automatically based on the available bandwidth, though it also possible to lock them at a certain setting.

name: Killing Floor: Horzine Outbreak
description: Horzine Outbreak is based on original Killing Floor mod (KFMod) v1.0 for Unreal Tournament 2004 by Alex Quick and tell a story about incident in Horzine Biotech, currently in progress and being made by the last version of Xash3D + XashXT.

name: Made In MFGG
description: A WarioWare fangame focusing on the use of the mouse and keyboard.

name: Svekmas: The Game
description:
Svekmas: The Game

Get ready for a hilarious holiday adventure in Svekmas: The Game! This lighthearted and satirical game was created as a tribute to Svekmas, the annual Christmas event hosted by DikkeSvekke.

Take control of Santa’s sleigh and his trusty reindeer in a fast-paced, fun-filled challenge. With simple controls (spacebar or right mouse click), navigate your way through an endless winter wonderland. Dodge Christmas trees, stay alive as long as possible, and climb the community leaderboard to prove you’re the ultimate sleigh master!

Will you survive the chaotic festivities and reign supreme this Svekmas season?

name: Aggrolotls
description: A top-down arena roguelike where you play as tiny axolotls and must evolve into a swarm that can take on powerful creatures from the sea. Level up and choose from upgrades that make each round feel unique.

name: Vaultframe
description: A sci-fi, zero-gravity side-scroller. Navigate a labyrinth of parasite-spore-infected energy cells on a space station, fighting parasites and evading deadly traps. Complete your mission and reach the only escape before the station’s purge wipes out everything alive.

name: The Wide Open Sky Is Running Out of Catfish
description: A story-driven photography game... on the back of a giant, flying catfish. Transform clouds into sea creatures and bring abundance back to an empty sky.

name: Kokeshi: The Secret of the Cicada's Nest
description: Sin descripción

name: Darby is Here Forever
description: Sin descripción

name: Opus Cortex
description: Sin descripción

name: Stay: Forever Home
description: A magical friend - who won't dig holes in your backyard. Ember's not your average pet! She weaves delight into your life and invites you to share her extraordinary world.

name: A Better World
description: A Better World tells the story of two women on the run from the Institute: Jo and Liz, and their mission to create a better, safer world. After three years of relative safety, their past has caught up with them: they find themselves hunted by retention synths and a rogue, ruthless courser, with everything they’ve worked to build at stake. To support this story, A Better World features a dual setting split between the vast wilderness of Abbot County and the derelict ruins of an underground pre-war shopping center called Vault-Tec Plaza.

name: Farmine Land
description: Dive into Farmine Land, a captivating 2D retro-style MMORPG where mining, crafting, and battling monsters come to life! Own lands as NFTs, earn Landcoin, and explore a world full of challenges and rewards.

name: Pokemon Aquamarine
description:
Pokémon Aquamarine and its eight variants are ROM hacks of FireRed that takes place in Manta, an entirely new region based off South America. The player character mysteriously turns into a Mew, and takes on a journey as a Pokémon trainer to figure out how to turn back to human.

Each variant corresponds with a different Eevee evolution. The differences between versions are minor and mostly aesthetic, so it is recommended you go with your favorite!

These variations include:
Opal - Eevee
Aquamarine - Vaporeon
Topaz - Jolteon
Garnet - Flareon
Amethyst - Espeon
Onyx - Umbreon
Turquoise - Leafeon
Quartz - Glaceon
Zircon - Sylveon

Features:
New Region based off South America
New Subregions based off Hawaii, Galapagos, and Antarctica
Sci-Fi story with a diverging plot depending on gender
All 411 species of Pokémon are obtainable without the need to trade
Certain Pokémon from newer regions up until Paldea will appear
Custom Fakemon include a hummingbird line, a dolphin line, and a tortoise line
Updated mechanics, including the Fairy Type and the Physical/Special Split
Updated Pokémon learnsets to include a more diverse set of moves
Newer gen moves with custom animations
Expanded bag storage
Dynamically changing Pokémarts based off number of badges
Items from newer games include Bottle Caps, Nature Mints, Ability Capsules, and Choice Items
TMs have infinite uses
HMs can be forgotten
HMs and certain TMs can be used by the player character Mew as field effects
AMs (Ability Machines) can be used by the player character Mew as field effects
Key Item that provides hints for next objective, suggests level caps, and spawns unlimited rare candies
Key Items that provide services such as EV/IV checking and Move Tutoring
Color-Coded Natures
Pokédex accurately shows Pokémon locations and stats
Quality of life changes from newer games
Decapitalized most in-game text

name: Shiver
description: A survival horror game where reality itself seems to unravel as you navigate the frozen hellscape to find your missing sister – defending yourself from horrors beyond our understanding, and nature itself. Solve puzzles, combat ice-covered nightmares, and most importantly, survive.

name: Amberspire
description: A science fantasy dice city builder. Construct buildings, manage resources, and build in harmony with an alien ecology. Beneath the glow of a gas giant, Amberspire will grow and prosper into a flourishing city atop the ruins of an abandoned moon.

name: Feed The Pit
description: JOIN THE SOCIETY. Avoid unpredictable horrors that will pursue you relentlessly. Perform rituals in a haunted forest to find dead bodies. Feed these bodies to THE PIT, lest you be fed to it yourself.

name: Survive: Frost Bite
description: Trapped in an isolated Antarctic research base, you’re hunted by bloodthirsty werewolves after a brutal attack. With every passing second, survival becomes a desperate struggle—will you outsmart the creatures stalking you, or will the relentless terror tear you apart before help arrives?

name: Cold Abyss: Directors Cut
description: COLD ABYSS is a relaxing and atmospheric exploration game where you repair internet cables on the bottom of the ocean.There are no enemies or other forms of danger down there. Just you.

name: The Scouring
description: The Scouring is an RTS with fast pace, high attention to detail and next generation experience. Lead humans or orcs to fight for victory! Play alone or with friends. Use modding tools to create custom game modes! Join The battle!

name: Soulblaze
description: Soulblaze is a creature-collecting roguelite in which you catch and train creatures called animons to fight your way through several regions and defeat their bosses in tactical turn-based battles with dice rolling mechanics. Build your team, upgrade and customize techniques, collect stickers, and hopefully survive until the end!

name: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions - Cozy Kitchen
description: Sin descripción

name: Die in the Dungeon: Classic
description: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.

name: Escape Simulator 2
description: Sequel to the best-selling escape room game, brings a fresh take on first-person puzzles with a variety of new rooms to explore solo or with friends. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, or craft your own escape rooms with Room Editor 2.0.

name: Saltwater Bodies
description:
Operate a tourist attraction by day, and conduct eldritch experiments by night to build yourself a new vessel.

Explore cave systems in a fully physics-based caving/swimming system, where you'll have to twist your head and breathe out precious air to fit through openings.

The narrative has a few branching points, depending on events that happen during dives or out on dry land.

name: Agents of Groove
description:
In a world where music and dancing have real power, a group of undercover dancers stumbles upon an evil conspiracy -- but will they be able to stop it?

Join field agent Daley Bellbottoms, information expert Melody Handler, and your other fellow agents as the new recruit of secret agency G.R.O.O.V.E., and help them find their... well, groove, on a daring mission around the world. Their tools? Dancing, mastery of rhythm, incredible style, and... okay, mostly dancing.

name: Celestial Orbiter Auranova: Those Who Denounce God
description:
In a future that refused to change, witness those who struggle for love and freedom, the atrocities committed by those in power, and the roaring cry of Those Who Denounce "God".
Celestial Orbiter Auranova - Those Who Denounce God, is an 80s mecha/prog rock inspired kinetic visual novel set in the distant future about a scrappy team of freedom fighters, the mysterious mecha they found, and their battle against an empire of corporations.

name: Cargo 19
description: Play as a brave pilot navigating a spaceship through the wastelands. Explore diverse locations, gathering resources to fulfill contracts while carefully planning your routes and avoiding damage to your ship.

name: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet
description: Set thousands of years in the future, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet puts players into the role of Jordan A. Mun, a dangerous bounty hunter who ends up stranded on Sempiria – a distant planet whose communication with the outside universe went dark hundreds of years ago. Jordan will have to use all her skills and wits if she hopes to be the first person in over 600 years to leave its orbit.

name: Okami Sequel
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
description: Race across land, sea, air, space, and time in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds! Warp through Travel Rings into new dimensions where something new awaits around every twist and turn.

name: Stage Fright
description: From the makers of OVERCOOKED! comes an all new co-operative experience. Take your friend on an amazing adventure as you explore, solve escape rooms, overcome fiendish obstacles and unravel an ancient mystery.

name: Dungeon & Fighter: Arad
description: Sin descripción

name: Turok: Origins
description: Play as the legendary Turok warriors to face off against ferocious dinosaurs and a terrifying alien threat that seeks to destroy all human life across the galaxy.

name: Project Century
description: An unreleased spin-off game of the Yakuza franchise set in early 1900s Japan.

name: Untitled Virtua Fighter Game
description:
We're excited to unveil a special preview of the concept video for the "New VIRTUA FIGHTER Project." This video was presented at the Consumer Electronics Show, the world's largest electronics trade fair, during the keynote speech by NVIDIA's founder and CEO, Jensen Huang.

Please note that this is a concept video created before development began. The actual gameplay and characters may differ from what is shown.

name: Blackfrost: The Long Dark 2
description: A year after the Aurora’s appearance & the world went dark, the people of Harmont & its vast wild environs struggle to survive the Quiet Apocalypse. Survive alone or with others against a host of new hazards & a fresh new survival sandbox from a pioneer of the genre. Live together. Die alone.

name: Untitled GenDesign Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Catly
description: An open-world adventure filled with surprises and joy, side by side with Cats! Build your dream island, meet various characters, and enjoy caring for your cats, dressing up, building, farming, racing, skiing, and much more! Explore freely and have endless fun with your furry companions!

name: Solasta II
description: In a Mana-infused land, a dark force led by the enigmatic Shadwyn threatens Neokos. Bring your party of adventurers together across perilous realms in this Turn-Based Tactical RPG based on the SRD 5e ruleset. You make the choices, dice decide your destiny.

name: Kyora
description: Delve into KYORA, a mystical multiplayer sandbox adventure, where every pixel is yours to shape, mine, build or explode.

name: Extinction Day
description: Extinction Day is a doomsday simulator where you wipe out humanity using disasters, diseases, wars, and other catastrophic events. Spread chaos worldwide, combine catastrophes for maximum destruction, and crush humanity's efforts to survive in this game of world-ending mayhem.

name: Kingdom Flipper
description: Grab a broom and hammer, it’s time to flip castles! Take drab strongholds and transform them into palaces fit for royalty. Take jobs, buy land, and build your dream castle all for profit, of course!

name: Sintopia
description: Build the resurrection business of your dreams with Sintopia! You are charged with managing the bureaucratic administration of Hell, your team of Imployees punish the dead souls for their Sins, generating a profit to help you build and sustain your Hellish empire.

name: Autogun Heroes: Supercharged
description: Blast through alien-infested planets and help Gus assemble a team of powerful heroes to save the galaxy. This challenging shoot 'em up 2D action platformer combines brutal chaos with smooth, responsive controls. Dodge. Roll. Dominate!

name: Towny Bar
description: Discover an Idle Management Game full of surprises. Take the reins of an old abandoned bar and improve and expand it to the delight of the inhabitants of Towny Town. During the story you will meet some of your neighbors, who will gladly help you in your hard tasks. Grow ingredients in your garden, craft drinks in your cellar, run your own arcade, unlock special abilities and discover forgotten mysteries, but above all, serve as many drinks as you can!

name: Elder Lich
description: Elder Lich is set in a world almost identical to 19th century Earth, except there's magic, undead, Germany is split between a South German Federation, a North German Federation and, between them, a country barely bigger than a city-state, Schadel.

name: Maximum Chaser: 1001 Squad
description: It is a universe similar to ours, where humans are technologically advanced but also full of evil. You will play as 2 member of the street organization "Maximum Chaser" and confront an evil security company A.A.S.S., making them scream under your gunfire.

name: Gridhack
description: Gridhack is a sci-fi puzzle RPG where you fight nonogram battles to hack your way on an intergalactic quest as you try to find out what happened to a planet called.. Earth?

name: 100 Screamers
description: 100 Screamers is a horror about a policewoman who came to a call, but turned out to be a toy in the hands of a maniac. Will she commit terrible things to survive or will she find a way out of a hopeless situation?

name: Full Metal Sergeant 2
description: The Sergeant is back. Ready to turn unqualified recruits into fearless war machines. Manage your camp and prepare your squad with tougher training and new challenges, will they be ready for a real battlefield? New skill tree, more abilities and a reworked battle system. Start you deployment now.

name: 07Gorillas
description: 07Gorillas is a top-down roguelike arena shooter game, you control one gorilla from a squad of seven break into "Foggy Zone" on a cleanup mission. Missions lasts less than 20 minutes, fight your way with powerful kung fu and tactical consumables, don't foget internal force enhancement.

name: Tiny Devils
description: Tiny Devils is a fast-paced multiplayer party game for 1-4 players. Race, jump, and climb through crazy obstacle courses, using wild power-ups like bees and magnets to mess with your rivals. Grab the crown and race to the finish line—the first one there wins, but chaos is guaranteed!

name: Laby to Panel de Shiritori
description: Play picture word chain with Laby, the knowledgeable robot! Fun for one player or two!

name: Project Solaris
description: A rogue-lite RPG about the 100-day challenge of Solaris, a Less magic power witch, and her sidekick Homu, with beautifully animated combat, quick-time events, and charming characters to interact with!

name: Ask Gear Re:Boost
description: A new, straightforward RPG! Hot scenarios and battles that go right to the heart of JRPGs. For those of you who still feel your youth in the RPGs of the PS1 and PS2 generations, this is the game for you.

name: Kokoro Talkers
description: A boy with amnesia and a girl with the power of "Monomane" allowing her to possess "objects." Talk to everything within the abandoned school—from keypads to computers—to reclaim lost memories and restore the future!

name: Iseikan Renai Guide: Interplanetary Love Guide
description: This PC game is a love simulation game set in the distant future where interstellar travel has become commonplace. Slavery, crime, violence... Interact with unique aliens and form close relationships with them in a world where anything is possible, where high technology and low technology coexist.

name: The Zombie Survival Guide
description: this is a 2D side scrolling real-time combat game Players can use AD to control characters' walking, space to jumping, and E-key interaction to explore the world, complete attack commands through the mouse, and use all the weapons provided in the story to resist zombies.

name: About a Boy: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: About a Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: South of the Circle: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Elemental Showdown
description: Unleash elemental chaos in this thrilling top-down arena party game! Fight using Fire, Water, and Plant elements, strategically switching between them to gain the upper hand. Navigate elemental shifting zones to outsmart your friends and emerge victorious!

name: Iron Village
description: With the help of your railway, build houses, farms, warehouses, and more to create your village. Trade what your people make for other resources and gold to grow your village into a prospering town, and grow the railway into a powerhouse.

name: Blast-A-Finn
description: A 2D physics-based platformer. play as a fish who can only move by blasting arm cannons in a direction and getting launched the opposite way.

name: Super Platform Tag
description: Tag, chase, and outsmart your friends in this chaotic platformer party game featuring your favorite variations of tag. Snag crazy power-ups, place obstacles to gain a winning edge, and unlock a colorful cast of characters and stages. Enjoy the ignorant bliss of childhood.

name: A Byte War
description: A Byte War is a real time strategy game where you lead a race of block-based machines against a machine threat from another dimension. Construct buildings from blocks arranged in various patterns and leverage your machines to convert the world around you.

name: Ghostslayers
description: Ghostslayers is a wave-based top-down coop shooter where you slay the ghosts with magic and couple thousands of bullets... Or punches, or slashes, or explosions. Use the varied weaponary, spell cards and abilities, combine them together with your allies for more power and get through the city.

name: Hyperwired
description: Pilot a ship with a charger hanging. Explore an ever-changing space an plug to recharge your energy while surviving the enemy breach in this cable-like space shooter with roguelike elements and plugged resource management.

name: Gladiators of Citadelum
description: The ultimate gladiator management sim. Hire and train fighters in different disciplines, defeat your rivals in the arena, climb through the ranks and, remember, give the best spectacle Rome has ever seen to survive. Blood and glory await!

name: 1cm Time
description: Explore, adventure, collect, and experience anecdotes and various interesting characters in a city-based 3D RPG, discovering some beautiful little worlds. Or perhaps wander aimlessly on the streets, relaxing in the shade of trees. Such a wonderful time is not far away.

name: A Case of Fraud
description: A non-linear detective adventure. Investigate a case of fraud by analysing documents from an abandoned office. Examine evidence, connect clues, and make your own deductions to solve the case.

name: Excavation Alliance: Cadoramo
description: A tough side-scrolling action roguelike game. In underground caves where various "animal" factions vie for resources, danger, treasures, and intrigue abound! To be a cave explorer, confronting numerous enemies with daggers, guns, great swords, or attack with magic wands!

name: Qualia
description: Intellica thanks you for volunteering in this short text-based AMT study. Pay attention to the participants answers, and classify them as either Human or Artificial. Remember, think happy!

name: Robo Ride & Glide
description: Ride, Glide, and collect powerups to upgrade your hover car, and gain an advantage against your friends in a random mini game

name: The Case of the Worst Day Ever
description:
A family is gathered for a cozy celebration, but everyone looks miserable! What happened here? Who are these people (and pets)?! And why are they so unhappy?!?

Revisit each family member's worst moment, deduce what happened, and cheer everyone up in this cozy fill-in-the-blank mystery!

name: Bambas!
description: Relive your childhood and turn every crosswalk, curb, and puddle into an epic adventure with this innovative urban walking simulator.

name: Love In Tiny Spaces
description: A bite sized quickie of a game, find your girlfriend and avoid her parents [and neighbours!] in this humorous tongue-in-cheek top-down stealth game! Navigate the corridors of the big city - then change it up using the powers of the Love Transport Authority(LTA), with love as your guide.

name: Skatehouse
description: Skatehouse is a small idle game where you manage a skate shop. Manufacture pieces, combine parts, and sell boards.

name: Wave Defense: Trappist
description: Gear up and get going! Defend your outposts from waves of alien enemies with your mech. Build and upgrade your base, protecting the extraction of the mysterious planetary system’s rich resources!

name: Sudden Soul
description: A sudden blackout within the city of Oasys causes havoc as people and creatures wake up with new powers. Control your party in this turn-based RPG with a mix of CCG. Combo different elements together. Light up an enemy who just got oil bombed, shock a ruffian after they get drenched in water.

name: Adventurers Guild Inc.
description: Adventurers Guild Inc. is a tycoon/management game where you build your Guild from the ground up! Hire staff, post quests, and fulfill the needs of independent adventurers (while taking a cut). Manage your budget, grow your reputation, and become the greatest Guild Master of all!

name: Darkbound
description: Darkbound is a survival horror game where you play as a cat. Avoid the darkness, solve puzzles and help other survivors to escape the hospital.

name: Longjuice Squeeze
description: Shoot, parry, and slash your way to self-awareness in Longjuice Squeeze, a roguelite fighting game where you get to steal gear from your opponent when you win. Featuring wild art, sick music, rollback netcode, and highly customizable fighters.

name: Supply Chained
description: An Open World Capitalism RPG where you manage a supply chain and keep anyone from touching it with all means necessary.

name: Stolen Realm Survivors
description: Stolen Realm Survivors is an online co-op survivor-like auto-shooter. Battle hordes of fierce enemies, discover ancient artifacts, merge unique skill trees, and unlock powerful upgrades to survive. Wield the full power of the Stolen Realm. Play solo or with friends against relentless minions!

name: Zombie Tower Survivor
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse in this top-down, tower-defense game with survivor-like elements. Customize your magic tower with talents and upgrades to defend it against zombie waves. Can you keep your tower alive?

name: Dawn of Kagura: Hatsuka's Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Dawn of Kagura: Keika's Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Evoscape
description: Action Roguelike where you build your organism by dividing and placing cells. Pick from random mutations and specialize your cells in one of 11 genes. Test your organism in a fast paced melee- and ranged combat with timing-based parry system against enemies and bosses.

name: Flaregate Network
description: Flaregate Network is a roguelike deckbuilder with RTS-inspired spaceship combat. Build a unique deck, then pilot it—and your fleet—to victory!

name: Blippo+
description: Never bland and non-demand. You simply can’t find television like this anywhere else. Change the way you channel with Blippo+. Coming soon.

name: Neon Abyss 2
description: Plunge into the chaotic cybermyth roguelike world of Neon Abyss 2! With diverse combat styles and unlimited item synergies, every run delivers a dramatic and action-packed experience you won't forget.

name: Recur
description: A time-bending journey to the end of the world and back. Run, jump, and manipulate time to solve puzzles as the apocalypse unfolds. Can you stop the clock on disaster?

name: Christmas Bazaar: Manager Simulator
description: Christmas Bazaar - Manager Simulator is a relaxed first-person simulation game where every aspect of running a Christmas Bazaar comes to life.

name: Curse of the Dragonbeast
description: A team-turn-based MOBA centralized around slaying monsters, gathering items, gaining levels, and competing in teams of five to slay an enemy teams dragon. CotDb takes place in a grimdark alternative future where dragons have returned to Earth, use their blood to grant magical powers to humans, and uses the same dragons blood to control their minds. Humans are used as soldiers in their war against other dragons, as they seek to collect magical artifacts to grow their Draconic magic. The player takes on the role of a dragons thrall, venturing into the wilds to fight enemy thralls and retrieve treasure for their master.

name: Go Slimey Go!
description: Go Slimey Go! is an easy-to-pick-up game for players of all ages! Help Slimey, our tiny slippery protagonist, visit his friends for some well deserved teatime after some thrilling platforming challenges! Just make sure not to get caught in the middle of the ultimate showdown between good and evil!

name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi 2
description: "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is a top-down, action, role-playing game. The game offers four major professions with over a dozen growth directions, more than one hundred weapons, and a rich array of special abilities. Countless powerful enemies lie ahead, and the shattered world needs you to repair it.

name: RuneQuest: Warlords
description: RuneQuest: Warlords is a battle-scale turn-based strategy game set in the Runequest universe. Immerse yourself in the rich lore of Glorantha. Become a warlord, master the use of runes and defend your tribe against the incursions of Chaos. Field an army drawing from heroes and creatures.

name: The Mystery Mist
description: In this world, deadly toxic mist is everywhere. The protagonist, Yaqing, becomes an apprentice to a physician skilled in using insects to save his sister, who has been poisoned by the mist. As the story progresses, he finds himself entangled in a tense racial conflict…
